title: Home
text:
Weclome
This site is designed to provide quick updates on current water temperatures of Lake Ontario and projected water temperatures based on NOAA’s GLERL website to facilitate projects on the lake.


Current Conditions

Current conditions for the array near Port Credit can be obtained at Ajax ECCC bouy.
Current conditions for the array near Hamilton can be obtained at Grimbsy ECCC bouy.
Current conditions for the array near Niagara can be obtained at Niagara on the lake ECCC Bouy.



Projected Conditions
This site is designed to provide quick updates on water temperatures from NOAA’s GLERL website for specific areas of Lake Ontario. Please click either Nowcast to see current projections for the past 12 hours and Forecast for the to next 72 hours.

title: Alewife Telemetry - Lake Ontario - Forcast Temperatures
text:
Purpose
This site is designed to provide quick updates on projected water temperatures from NOAA’s GLERL website for specific areas of Lake Ontario.
This site will automatically rebuild every 12 hr and will pull the latest projection.


Area of interest
Below is a interactive map with the area and corresponding ‘nodes’ or locations in relation to the projected data.








Predicted thermal profiles
Below are predicted thermal profiles for nodes 3383, 4512, and 5088 which are the center of the the array. The frist plot is static.









The second is dynamic:

title: Alewife Telemetry - Lake Ontario - Nowcast Temperatures
text:
Purpose
This site is designed to provide quick updates on projected water temperatures given current conditions from NOAA’s GLERL website for specific areas of Lake Ontario.
This site will automatically rebuild every 12 hr and will pull the latest projection.


Area of interest
Below is a interactive map with the area and corresponding ‘nodes’ or locations in relation to the projected data.








Predicted thermal profiles
Below are predicted thermal profiles for nodes 3383, 4512, and 5088 which are the center of the the array.
